instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PP5V_S3: What is PP5V_S3? PP5V_S3 is a 5v power rail present when the system is in an S3 suspend to RAM state..
definitions.PP3V3_S5_REG: What is PP3V3_S5_REG? PP3V3_S5_REG is a 3.3v power rail present when the machine is in an S5 soft off state. .
definitions.PP5V_S5_LDO: What is PP5V_S5_LDO? PP5V_S5_LDO is a 5v rail present when the machine is in a S5 soft off state. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> missing <SIGNAL>PP5V_S3</SIGNAL>
threads.message:
Hi

Board was liquide damaged. After cleaning by ultrasonic cleaner it was worked but  one day later it stopped. When i checked voltage cant see  <SIGNAL>PP5V_S3</SIGNAL>.
When i checked <CHIP>U7200</CHIP> its too hot and replaced it 2 times but nothing changed its also hot. After that i was removed L7260,<TRANSISTOR>Q7260</TRANSISTOR>,<TRANSISTOR>Q6201</TRANSISTOR>,<TRANSISTOR>Q7220</TRANSISTOR>,L7220, and all resistors and capacitors around <CHIP>U7200</CHIP> but same status:(  <SIGNAL>PPVIN_S5_5VS3</SIGNAL> is 12.8 not problem. Do you have any suggestion ?

note: I checked <SIGNAL>PP5V_S3_REG</SIGNAL> and <SIGNAL>PP3V3_S5_REG</SIGNAL> not short a ground.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> missing <SIGNAL>PP5V_S3</SIGNAL>
threads.message: <CHIP>U7200</CHIP> can only get hot if one of the LDOs is overloaded. Only one connected to anything is VREG5, what is resistance to GND on that pin?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> missing <SIGNAL>PP5V_S3</SIGNAL>
threads.message: when i measure <CHIP>U7200</CHIP> pin 17 ( <SIGNAL>PP5V_S5_LDO</SIGNAL>) its show 10K resistance but know good board its endless. then  injected 5V this pin <CHIP>U5805</CHIP> is hot and removed that ic but <CHIP>U7200</CHIP> also hot. Maybe my <CHIP>U7200</CHIP> was damaged :(
